item.title: Notes on Remote Work
item.description: she’s totally correct there that there is a totally different issue at play - that these people are left behind in a totally remote future (…) the reality is that a remote-first workforce is going to be exclusionary for different reasons - those that don’t have a stable internet connection, those who can’t afford their own computer, and so on. There’re also those who have no space at home to separate their work from their personal life, and those with children
